1   package com.test.vendor.oracle;
2   
3   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
4   
5   public abstract class ConcreteOracleSuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
6   
7       public ConcreteOracleSuiteIT() {
8           this.config();
9       }
10      
11      public void config() {
12          this.jdbcURL = "jdbc:oracle:thin:@localhost:1521:XE";
13          this.jdbcUser = "system";
14          this.jdbcPass = "Password1_One";
15          this.jsqlDatabaseName = "XDB";
16          this.jsqlTableName = "APP_USERS_AND_ROLES";
17          this.jsqlColumnName = "NAME";
18          
19          this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName = "owner";
20          this.jdbcColumnForTableName = "table_name";
21          this.jdbcColumnForColumnName = "column_name";
22          
23          this.jdbcQueryForDatabaseNames = "SELECT distinct owner FROM all_tables";
24          this.jdbcQueryForTableNames = "SELECT distinct table_name FROM all_tables where owner='XDB'";
25          this.jdbcQueryForColumnNames = "SELECT distinct column_name FROM all_tab_columns where owner='XDB' and table_name='APP_USERS_AND_ROLES'";
26          this.jdbcQueryForValues = "SELECT distinct NAME FROM XDB.APP_USERS_AND_ROLES";
27      }
28  }
